tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had a bankart lesion after ring fight (kick boxing). This happened twice. I decided to get this fixed everyone convinced me surgery is the only option. As a fitness enthusiast, it was difficult for me to accept that I have to go through a surgery. I consulted almost 5 suggested surgeons, but when I met Dr. Pavan, he was the only one who explained my problem soooo clearly and my treatment. From the day 1, until my recover he was always available when needed 
Surgery was just a day being in the hospital, pain started after the 2nd day of surgery. Dr. Pavan was always available and suggesting the best things to do. Started Physio therapy as per his advice, today it been two months, now I‚Äôll felling confident with my arm than ever.
Post surgery, his care, *** ********* of what‚Äôs happening and what will happen was astounding. 
He understands what we want, he helped me through out this phase for me to recover faster. 
To conclude, his care *** *** ********* of the issue is enormous. Will recommend him to anyone with this issue without hesitation.
If you are reading this and going through such recovery phase, wish you all a speedy recovery!
reply_text: Thanks for your valuable feedback Madhan, much appreciated.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My recovery has been progressing well, with no significant complications. The pain management was effective, and I was able to manage discomfort with the prescribed medication. I am highly satisfied with the outcome of the surgery. The improvement in my hip function is remarkable, and I would definitely recommend Dr Pavan Chebbi and facility to others.

review: An amazing doctor with great skills. He correctly  identified  my ACL and meniscus tears at my first visit at Amber Clinic. He clearly explains to me what is to be done to correct it. Surgery has done by Dr. Pavan and I am recovering fast as per the  plan.  I would suggest anyone to visit Dr. Pavan,if you have any joint or orthopedic problems or if you are troubled by any type of sports related injuries.
reply_text: Thanks for your valuable feedback, much appreciated.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was a very painful experience. Knowing that my ACL is torn and surgery is the only way. Being away from sports for 9 months, it was very difficult time. I researched on Practo and decided to consult Dr. Pavan Chebbi after looking at his experience in the field if sports injury. He explained everything very patiently at his Amber Clinic. He assured me that I will be able to go back to sports if I get the surgery done. He connected me ro relevant party to get my insurance on the way. Once insurance was approved, the surgery was performed at Apollo Spectra Hospital, Koramangala. The surgery was performed without any complications. Dr. Pavan talked to me during the surgery and showed me the damaged and replaced ACL. After the surgery, I was transferred to the ward where the hospital staff was very negligent. This was the only bad experience I had. Immediately after the surgery, the care provided by the hospital was minimal. The Physiotherapist that the hospital provided for initial exercises was also very arrogant. But at night, the nurse took really good care. It was a difficult night as it was the first night after surgery. Anyway, once I was discharged, I revisited Dr. Pavan for further procedures such as dressing and stitches removal. Even during lockdown, he kept touch with me on Whatsapp and via call. I started going to a Physiotherapist nearby and he told me about the exercises. Dr. Pavan also taught some exercises that I started performing. It is been over two and a half months now, as the surgery was performed on 12th March. I met Dr. Pavan day before yesterday and my recovery is excellent, both according to him and my Physiotherapist. I am confident that in 9 months I will be able to play again. I am really grateful to Dr. Pavan whi is an outstanding surgeon and an even better human being. He has quite literally helped me get back on my feet with confidence. I recommend him for any Orthopaedic advice without a doubt. ** ** ****** *** ** *** *****
reply_text: Thanks for the valuable feedback, much appreciated.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I could tell March 29th is a big milestone in my life. Because I met Dr. Pavan Chebbi for my Elbow fracture.
I had lost my hope regarding my right hand as I am not able to bend or stretch it, it was stuck somewhere 95 to 100 degrees. At that time I was not able to do my normal works like having food, washing my face as my palm is not reaching.
In this time, he patiently listened to my problem and He gave me HOPE that I could use my right hand normally as before and asked me to go for surgery. The surgery went well and almost took more than 3 hours (31-03-2021). After that he suggested me to go for physiotherapy for 2 months. But before one month only I am feeling normal about my right hand. Now I can eat, wash my face, and do normal activities with the right hand, and continue my office work without any problem.
I could say the Doctor is a very cool and calm person, and listens to the patient's problems with uttermost patience, and explains the problems and any causes bit by bit slowly so that any layman could understand easily. Down-to-earth person. I am totally satisfied with Dr. Pavan Chebbi's treatment. And also He helped me to get my insurance very easily, he provided all the documents whenever needed. I strongly recommend to others with orthopedic problems.
reply_text: Thanks for your valuable feedback, much appreciated.

review:
Explanation was through.
Though this was just consultation,  i will leave better feedback post 15days again, cause i was asked to do certain activity for these days.
**** ***** ** * ****** *** *** ********** **** ** ****** **** ** ****** *
reply_text: Thanks for your valuable feedback, much appreciated.

review: *** ** *** **** ******** He is kind and gave enough time . One thing that really caught my eye was he arranged his car for us to get xray done. Never seen any doctor doing that. That too to a lab which charged lesser than other labs. Also, he explained issues well, and as I wanted to discuss about surgery cost, he spoke to someone and confirmed whether my insurance would be covered or not. I really loved the way he treats the patient. Great human being.
reply_text: Thanks for your valuable feedback, much appreciated.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
After I had a ACL tear I was was advised a surgery. I decided to consult Dr. Pavan who was referred by my colleague. He gave a detailed explanation of the type of arthroscopy, the materials used for the surgery, the rehabilitation period & time to get back to sports and riding which is my passion. I had almost a smooth recovery post surgery. The physio exercises also helped a great deal. 
After more than a year of the surgery I am back to what I love. Thanks to doc for his timely help and support. I would like to recommend Dr. Pavan Chebbi for anyone with ACL injury.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback, much appreciated.

review:
Took treatment from Dr Pavan for my mothers knee arthritis and total knee replacement. We have visited many ortho doctors before this but my mother liked to get the treatment from Dr Pavan only because he gave us his assurance for a good outcome after the surgery. 
After the surgery despite the pain my mother was able to walk from next day itself and slowly she is regaining the strength and movement of the leg as before. I am satisfied with the choice of treatment and the excellent outcome given by Dr Pavan.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My knee was giving me trouble since I had a twisting injury about 2 years ago. 
It was miss diagnosed as arthritis and I have taken 2 injections and various medication since then. My friend suggested we meet Dr. Pavan Chebbi. 
In complete professionalism I was tested in detail and diagnosed with the help of a 3T MRI that I actually had a torn meniscus. 
I had to be operated for an arthroscopic meniscus repair. 
After about a month of the surgery my knee, for the first time in 2 years felt normal!! 
I am extremely thankful for Dr Pavan‚Äôs accurate diagnosis and treatment. I can confidently recommend him as a best orthopaedic doctor.
reply_text: Thanks for your valuable review Sahid, appreciate it.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
April 2021 just before the lockdown I met with an accident and injured my shoulder. 
Got xray which showed no fractures and I was advised to wear sling and prescribed medicine.
After one month i was not able to move my shoulder at all! I kept trying physiotherapy and massages it made it worse.. 
I was in excruciating pain and no amount of medicines and injections helped me.
I then consulted Dr. Pavan Chebbi who did a thorough check up, got CT and MRI scans and found out that my tendons were stuck in between the shoulder joint. I had to undergo arthroscopic surgery to release and reattach the tendons. 
As promised by the doctor I started moving my shoulder within 2 weeks! I am extremely happy with the surgery. 
No amount thanks is enough for Dr Pavan Chebbi and his team. He is absolutely calm and his reassuring words helped me through the whole process.
reply_text: Thanks Suresh for your valuable feedback, much appreciated.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been consulting doctor for the last six months,   I visited the clinic due to some pain in my shoulder and doctor advised me get an MRI to understand the problem. After MRI got to know that there's tear in my muscle and needs an Arthroscopy to repair it. Though initially I was so scared, Pavan explained me the problem clearly and also the surgical procedure. After surgery follow up was really good, doctor gave me right exercises and medication to recover soon and was always available over the phone call for all emergency purposes. Now I'm recovered to better extent and could see major improvement in my shoulder muscle. Thank you doctor for your amazing treatment and kind support.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback Anand, much appreciated.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Chebbi was recommended by my sister who had undergone a successful treatment under him. 
My wife is a patient of Osteoarthritis for many years. We have newly moved to Bengaluru and planning to get knee replacement done. 
Doctor sahab did a detailed examination and counselling about the surgery in the most simple words as possible so that I and my wife could understand. 
After my wife underwent the surgery she was back to her walking within days. Her physiotherapy was also provided at home for our convenience. 

We are great full to Dr Chebbi for his treatment. He took care of us as if we were his own family. 
Thank you Doctor.
reply_text: Thanks for your valuable feedback.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I visited Dr Pavan Chebbi for a ACL knee injury. He examined me thoroughly and explained about the surgery to follow with a guarantee that I can go back to playing sports.
He performed a keyhole surgery on my knee joint. During the surgery he showed me the video Live inside my knee and repaired my ACL ligament. Now after 10 months after surgery I am back to playing badminton and go to gym regularly.
He is very transparent about the surgery charges and insurance workups. Even the follow-ups and physiotherapy went on smoothly. 
Thank you doctor.

I wish him All the Best!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My experience with Dr Chebbi- Mother was having the right knee trouble since 2 years. She is 65 years of age. She managed the pain without any problems. But unfortunately had a minor fall late 2021. 
Since then it became difficult for her to walk even a few steps. We went for a check up with Dr Chebbi and in his opinion she had a ligament meniscus tear for which treatment was given. He also told that this situation can flare up her already existing osteo-arthritis. Also he told us about a possibility of a knee replacement in the near future. My mother managed the pain for few more months and when she had enough then we again consulted Dr Chebbi. As usual we had a lot of questions and doubts but all of them were answered by the doctor. In early March 2022 we had the total knee replacement surgery done and now in mid April she is doing better then we had expected. She‚Äôs walking independently, doing her chores, exercises with out much effort. We are great full that we happen to get a good doctor like Dr Chebbi. He has made this whole process so simple and did not hesitate to answer all our questions at anytime. Overall it was smooth process and thanks to doctor and his team.
reply_text: Thanks for your valuable review, much appreciated.

review: He listened to my mother's issues very patiently and evaluated her situation and lifestyle well. We will definitely go with him for surgery.

review: Booked an appointment at 12:45PM and then got a call one hour before the appointment where the lady asked us to come before 12:30PM as doctor will not be available after that. review:
I consulted with Dr Pavan for ACL injury of the knee followed by reconstruction. After several visits to different clinics and hospitals I have decided to get this done under him. I got a strong recommendation from my runner friends that he understands what are their fitness needs. Sure enough I am satisfied with what was told and underwent with the surgery. It has been a year since the surgery and at my recent visit Dr Pavan and I were both extremely happy about the progress and the fact that I am able to perform to my maximum limit without any pain and discomfort. The continued motivation throughout the follow up and the attention to my physiotherapy needs helped get to pre injury level of fitness faster.
My sincere thanks and wishes to Dr Pavan.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My mother is arthritis patient and we were looking for a good knee replacement doctor. 
As suggested by our friends we consulted Dr Chebbi for this purpose. 
A month ago both of my mothers knees were replaced successfully. Despite the initial problems of pain and imbalance she has got better with time. However, there were minor issues with the insurance at the hospital which needed to be addressed by the staff. But in general and in view of the results of the surgery we are satisfied. My wholehearted gratitude goes to Dr Chebbi for helping my mother walk again.
reply_text: Thanks for your valuable feedback, much appreciated.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been having issues with my right knee joint from the day I had an accident around 15 years ago. The issues with my knee was very complicated there were multiple ligamentous tears and I had started to develop arthritis. I met a lot of doctors who recommended knee replacement surgery but since it is a dead-end last resort option I was hesitant to take it as I am very active and independent. Dr Pavan Chebbi recommended me an osteotomy surgery which does not require any replacement, relieve the pain and also let me be as active as possible. 
Doctor explain to me in very simple terms The exact nature of the procedure The advantages and disadvantages at my age 57. 
During my recent follow-up after eight months of the surgery I am able to do all my routine chores and the doctor has told me to start cycling and light exercises.
I am very satisfied with the treatment provided by Dr Pavan Chebbi I would like to wish him great success in his noble endeavours.
reply_text: Thanks for your valuable feedback, much appreciated.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Myself had been diagnosed with Hip AVN right side stage 3 and left side stage 2. I had been told for complete bed rest or Hip replacement. At my age I am 43 many family doctors friends were against joint replacement. Then I have read about Bone marrow stem cells treatment for AVN. I approached Dr Pavan for the same and he had explained about the whole process with good to excellent results guarantee. So I had went ahead with the surgery. It is showing very good results now and my latest MRI also is showing that the treatment is working. I and my family are very much thankful for the treatment by Dr Pavan and Will like to recommend people who have unfortunately this AVN condition. To seek the right type of treatment.

I would like to pen down my experience on the knee condition and treatment- 
I had undergone ACL reconstruction in 2015 in Chennai after which my knee always gave me problems. There was a twang in the knee and after I played football the knee swells up and had problems in movements. One fine day i had a small twist of the knee in the bathroom and the reconstructed ACL tore. With a lot of scepticism I approached Dr Pavan Chebbi because I knew that RE operation was the only option and what if the same thing happens again!! Doctor explained me the reason for the failure and assured me that the new surgery will guarantee a return to normalcy. I went ahead with the surgery and now my knee feels more natural. After 6 months now I have no major complaints. Now i am confident to get back to physical activities. I would like to thank Dr Pavan for his skill and confidence.
